name: Wyrd Reconstruction
notes: Wyrd Reconstruction has a number of unique interactions with [[Critical Heal (Darkest Dungeon II)|critical healing]]:  * The critical heal does not use the maximum value of the skill as in the case of a critical attack, but the randomly rolled value. This means that it is possible to roll a critical heal for 0% of the target's health while simultaneously bleeding the target. * A critical heal restores 200% of randomly rolled amount instead of the usual 150%. * The upgraded version of this skill is the only heal in the game that has a 10% chance to critically heal instead of the usual 5%.
